schools.name: Ledgewood Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Ledgewood Elementary School, a public school located in Roscoe, IL, serves grades PK-1 in the Kinnikinnick Central Consolidated School District 131.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Stone Creek School
schools.school-summary: Stone Creek School, a public school located in Roscoe, IL, serves grades 2-3 in the Kinnikinnick Central Consolidated School District 131.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Roscoe Middle School
schools.school-summary: Roscoe Middle School, a public school located in Roscoe, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Kinnikinnick Central Consolidated School District 131.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 10 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Kinnikinnick School
schools.school-summary: Kinnikinnick School, a public school located in Roscoe, IL, serves grades 4-5 in the Kinnikinnick Central Consolidated School District 131.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
